name: Visual Novel Maker - TOKIWA GRAPHICS Event BG No.2 Inn
detailed_description:
Background art is the backdrop to your story, it defines the overall impression of your mood and vibe, sets the scene for your story to unfold, and you want to make sure it looks right and translates your true intention. With some help from Studio Tokiwa's professional artists you can give your game the backdrop it deserves!

TOKIWA GRAPHICS presents 2 packs of Event Back-Grounds with different themes. This pack contains Inn, Hall and Room BGs with 4 variations each, for a total of 8 beautiful images ready to be used for your RPG Maker and Visual Novel Maker project!

Features:

* Inn, Hall and Room BackGrounds (4 variations each; day, sunset, night, slightly dark)
* Total of 8 BG images for your RPG Maker and Visual Novel Maker projects!
